imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Elegant hero background image with Indian ethnic fashion theme featuring rich traditional textile patterns and warm colors (hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Elegant saree display with flowing silk fabric in rich colors showcasing traditional Indian craftsmanship (category-sarees.dim_400x300.png)
- Stylish western dress collection featuring modern silhouettes and contemporary designs (category-western-dresses.dim_400x300.png)
- Ornate lehenga with intricate embroidery and embellishments in vibrant festive colors (category-lehenga.dim_400x300.png)
- Exquisite traditional Indian jewellery set with gold accents and precious stones (category-jewellery.dim_400x300.png)
- Beautiful saree with traditional motifs as product fallback image (fallback-sarees.dim_300x400.png)
- Modern western dress as product fallback image with clean elegant styling (fallback-western-dresses.dim_300x400.png)
- Stunning lehenga as product fallback image with decorative details (fallback-lehenga.dim_300x400.png)
- Traditional jewellery pieces as product fallback image with intricate details (fallback-jewellery.dim_300x400.png)

existing_features.title: Generate a new hero section background image with an elegant Indian ethnic fashion theme featuring rich colors and traditional textile patterns
Generate attractive category preview images for Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, and Jewellery sections on the home page
Generate fallback product images for each category (Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, Jewellery) to replace the current placeholder images
Update frontend components to render the newly generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace all website images with attractive ones
